page.title: 05MARSHES FARM,CHIPSTAPLE (2)
page.content:
Mrs Stevens breeds Highland ponies and sometimes sells the ponies to France and Scotland. Mrs Stevens owns 7 Highlands and 1 Dartmoor.
The land that they own is very steep and hilly, however on it they grow straw hay and silage. About mid July they will start to cut the silage and when it is all cut it is taken to a silage pit where they pack it all down by running over it with the tractor. After this has been done it is covered with black plastic sheeting and weighed down with old tyres. It is left in the pit until the winter when it is fed to all the animals.
